4317940.name: Infinite Game Cartridge Collection - Dungeon Grove
4317940.description:
This DLC adds the game Dungeon Grove to the collection.

Dungeon Grove is a top-down roguelike dungeon crawler. Each run throws you into a hostile, ever-changing dungeon filled with enemies, traps, and tough decisions. No two runs play exactly the same, pushing you to learn patterns, react quickly, and make the most of what you’re given.

Fight your way through procedurally generated rooms, face off against dangerous enemies, and push deeper into the dungeon as the challenge steadily ramps up. Success depends on your reflexes, positioning, and ability to adapt on the fly.
